import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Register = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', academicTitle: '', institution: '', institutionCountry: '', email: '', phone: '', password: '' }) const { firstName, lastName, academicTitle, institution, institutionCountry, email, phone, password } = formData const handleChange = e => { setFormData({ ...form }) } return (

Create an account now FOR FREE!

Please submit your current university, institution or research center
Do not forget the country code prefix, e.g: 001, 00216, ...etc
Password contain only numbers, 10 charecters at least
) } Register.propTypes = {} export default Register
